story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Master Alder, we heard about what
happened.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You’re going to battle Benga in the Arceus
Cup, right?
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Instead of relying on just words, I felt I
needed to guide him through my actions.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It’s a decision I made after seeing how much
stronger Trainers on this island have grown.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I need to move forward. Otherwise, I won’t
be able to teach others the meaning
of strength.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_0900_10:
you decided to relinquish your Champion title
to Iris.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1000_10:
I remember how you dedicated and trained
yourself even harder back then.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1100_10:
As a result, Iris has become a wonderful
Champion Unova is proud of.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Your decision to step down as Champion for
someone who’ll lead the future was the
right choice.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1300_10:
So I believe you’re making the right choice
this time, too.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hm, I wonder... I won’t know the results
until I try.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I’m sure your feelings about your grandson’s
future will get through to him.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1600_10:
But try not to worry too much, even if he’s
your grandson.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_1800_10: That’s what you told me, remember?
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Well then, you don’t have much time until
the tournament.
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_2100_10: Will you spar with me like we once did?
story_arceus_04_08000/2401_1001_2300_10:
I want to be sure my Pokémon are in top
condition to challenge Benga.
